JWT.name: Authorization
JWT.description: Enter Your AccessToken (JWT) for Login. Example: Bearer ...token...

get.description: No need to log out. You must deleted Token from your browser.

You can send query with endpoint for search[], sort[], page and limit.
    Examples:
  • URL/?search[field1]=value1&search[field2]=value2
  • URL/?sort[field1]=1&sort[field2]=-1
  • URL/?page=2&limit=1
